column2: Glm.Train1 <- glm(Creditability ~ Account.Balance + Duration.of.Credit..month. + Payment.Status.of.Previous.Credit + Purpose + Credit.Amount + Value.Savings.Stocks + Length.of.current.employment + Instalment.per.cent + Sex...Marital.Status+Guarantors+ Telephone+ Foreign.Worker, data = german.credit.train, family = "binomial")

Tree.train1 <- rpart(Creditability ~ Account.Balance + Duration.of.Credit..month. + Payment.Status.of.Previous.Credit + Purpose + Credit.Amount + Value.Savings.Stocks + Length.of.current.employment + Instalment.per.cent + Sex...Marital.Status, data=german.credit.train, method="class",control=rpart.control(cp=0.022,minsplit=30,xval=10, maxsurrogate=0))
